div.div: Occidental College vs. Univ. of Redlands
at Redlands, CA | Ted Runner Stadium

tr.td: Coin toss: Redlands won, elected to receive.
Max Gruber kickoff 65 yards to the UR0, James Ramirez return 21 yards to the UR21 (Casey Dudley;Evan Buckwalter).
Bobby Brown rush for 7 yards to the UR28 (Aaron Noffke;Nicholas McHugh).
Kevin Russell pass complete to Bobby Brown for 26 yards to the OXY46, 1ST DOWN UR, out-of-bounds (Matthew Malos).
